summary: A hamburger, or burger, is a popular food made of ground meat (usually beef) in a bun. It often includes cheese, vegetables like lettuce and tomato, and sauces like ketchup or mayonnaise. The "cheeseburger" is a famous variation with a slice of cheese. Burgers are commonly found at fast-food places but can also be served in fancier restaurants. They are an American favorite and have become famous worldwide, with chains like McDonald's and Burger King making them iconic.
title: Hamburger
